greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Period 6: repeat [0, 0, 1, 1, 1, 2].
link: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,0,0,0,1).
formula: a(n) = 5/6 - cos(Pi*n/3)/3 - sin(Pi*n/3)/sqrt(3) - cos(2*Pi*n/3)/3 - sin(2*Pi*n/3)/sqrt(3) - (-1)^n/6. - _R. J. Mathar_, Oct 08 2011
G.f.: (x^2+x^3+x^4+2*x^5)/(1-x^6); a(n) = abs( mod(1-n,3) - mod(1+n,2) ). - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 20 2014
a(n) = a(n-6) for n>5. - _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Jun 20 2016
maple: f := proc(n) local j; j:=n mod 6; if (j<=1) then 0 elif (j<=4) then 1 else 2; fi; end;
mathematica: CoefficientList[Series[(x^2 + x^3 + x^4 + 2 x^5)/(1 - x^6), {x, 0, 100}], x] (* _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 20 2014 *)
program: (MAGMA) [Abs( ((1-n) mod 3) - ((1+n) mod 2) ) : n in [0..100]]; // _Wesley Ivan Hurt_, Aug 20 2014
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Jul 31 2009
